-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Support JSON for SQL Database.
--   
--   Library contains instances of ToJson(JSON2) class for SqlValue(HDBC)
--   and functions for manipulation JSON.
@package json2-hdbc
@version 0.5.1


-- | This Library Contains instances class <a>ToJson</a> for
--   <a>SqlValue</a> and functions for manipulation <a>Json</a> .
module Database.JSON2.HDBC

-- | Transform SQL-like JSON array of to tree-like JSON object with use
--   column.
groupWithCol :: Json -> Json

-- | Conversion SQL-like JSON array of to tree-like JSON object with use N
--   columns.
groupWithNCol :: Int -> Json -> Json
instance ToJson SqlValue
